description: Limit information system access to authorized users, processes acting on behalf of authorized users, and devices
Ensure that managers, system administrators, and users are made aware of security risks
Create, protect, and retain information system audit records
Periodically assess security controls, authorize system operation, and monitor controls
Establish and maintain baseline configurations and inventories
Establish, maintain, and implement plans for emergency response, backup, and recovery
Identify and authenticate users and devices
Establish operational incident handling capability
Perform periodic and timely maintenance, provide controls over tools and personnel
Protect information system media
Limit physical access to information systems and facilities
Develop, document, update, and implement security and privacy plans
Establish information security and privacy programs
Ensure persons occupying positions of responsibility are trustworthy
Provide transparency about PII processing
Periodically assess risk
Allocate resources to adequately protect information systems
Monitor, control, and protect communications
Identify, report, and correct information system flaws in a timely manner
Manage supply chain risks
